desc: The GuruGo brainwave entrainment device utilizes a combination of the 6 most powerful brainwave entrainment modalities to gently, yet automatically, guide your brain into optimal states during each session. This premier mind machine makes positive, lasting transformation possible – and achievable – for all humans.

layout.text: The GuruGo premium mind machine helps ambitious change makers break through fear and doubt, so they can take consistent action toward their dreams.
